abilities.description: Your mech wields a chain whip that can be charged with ionized particles. When you charge your whip, roll +iron. On a hit, take up to +3 energy. On a weak hit, take up to +2. On a miss, take up to +2 but suffer -1 integrity. The whip’s max energy is 3. When you make moves aided by this energy to attack or overcome obstacles, add +2 and suffer -1 energy.
